name: Mets
title: CS Mets at DX
notes:
**Note 1**:  When both FIGO stage and metastatic detail are available, record the code with metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage. 

**Note 2**:  FIGO Stage IV, NOS is assigned based on tumor extension and/or metastasis.  Code CS Mets at DX based on a physician's statement of FIGO Stage IV, NOS only if it is known that the stage value is assigned because of metastasis.
rows:
Distant lymph node(s) other than code 11:
    Deep inguinal, NOS:
        Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
    Distant lymph node(s), NOS
(Excluding metastasis to pelvic or para-aortic lymph nodes)

Distant metastases, except distant lymph node(s) 
Carcinomatosis
(Excluding metastasis to adnexa and continuous extension to abdominal tissues)

40 + (11 and/or 12)

Distant metastasis plus distant lymph node(s)
FIGO Stage IV [NOS] based on distant metastasis

Unknown; distant metastasis not stated
Distant metastasis cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
